title: Infiltrate Moonrise Towers
content:
ough the shadow-cursed lands, and defended them against shadows. Grateful, one of them showed us where to find a safe haven nearby. We reached the shadow-cursed lands. The Dream Visitor told us to go to Moonrise Towers and infiltrate the cult of the Absolute. The cult's secrets may teach us how to free ourselves of these parasites.

Infiltrate the cult of the Absolute

We found Balthazar in the temple below the Thorm Mausoleum. He asked us to help him find the relic for Ketheric.
